summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5726 for the improvement of 46th Avenue Northeast, from East 45th Street to the north line of Laurelvista Addition; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75610, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
